title: Odoo ERP Specialist Needed for Manufacturing Implementation
job_overview:
We are a growing pizza manufacturing company based in Australia, looking for an experienced Odoo ERP professional to support and manage our production and operations modules. Our company operates a fast-paced production line and requires a specialist who can streamline processes, improve system accuracy, and support cross-functional teams.

Key Responsibilities:
• Manage and optimise Odoo modules including:
• Manufacturing
• Purchasing
• Inventory
• PLM (Product Lifecycle Management)
• Maintenance
• Repairs
• Collaborate closely with our Accounts/Finance Team and Product Manager to ensure accurate data flow between production, procurement, and financial reporting.
• Assist with system configurations, troubleshooting, workflow improvements, and user training.
• Identify and implement best practices to improve manufacturing and operational efficiency.
• Maintain documentation of processes and configurations for internal reference.

Requirements:
• Proven, hands-on experience with Odoo ERP (particularly Manufacturing, Inventory, PLM, Maintenance, and Repairs modules).
• Strong understanding of supply chain, production workflows, and inventory management.
• Ability to work collaboratively with finance/accounting and operational teams.
• Experience in the food manufacturing sector (highly preferred but not essential).
• Strong problem-solving skills, proactive approach, and attention to detail.
• Fluent in English, able to communicate effectively with Australian-based teams.

Position Details:
• Initial engagement: Part-time (2 to 3 hours per day).
• Potential transition: Full-time (up to 40 hours/week) based on performance and business needs.
• Trial period: 8 weeks. This trial will assess technical capabilities, communication, and cultural fit.
• Location: Remote, but applicants must be available during Australian business hours for collaboration as needed.

Why Join Us?
• Be part of a fast-growing, innovative food manufacturing business.
• Work directly with leadership and play a key role in shaping operational systems.
• Long-term opportunity for committed professionals.

How to Apply:
Please include:
• A brief cover letter highlighting your Odoo experience (especially in manufacturing).
• Relevant case studies or project examples.
• Your availability during Australian hours.
